TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @electronic{leferrand2024ntu, author = {Le Ferrand, {'E}ric and Prud'hommeaux, Emily and Hartshorne, Joshua K. and Sung, Li-May}, year = {2024}, title = {{NTU} {Paiwan} {ASR} Corpus},type = {Electronic Resource}}

S.FORM: ka sicuayan a tja kakudan, numakakivaqu izua a tja sisan pazangal a palisiyan, mavan azua masalut. a pumaljimalji tua tja cemas i ti tjagaraus, satje kana pulami, puvaqu tua tja si sikavaljut aya patarevan nua aicu a pupalisiyan.

ka sicoayan a tja kakodan, nomakakivaqo izoa a tja sisan pazangal a palisiyan, mavan azoa masalot. a pomaljimalji toa tja cemas i ti tjagaraos, satje kana polami, povaqo toa tja si sikavaljot aya patarevan noa aico a popalisiyan.

nu sangasangasan a qadaw ta masalusalut, kaiumaq itjen a taqinaljan a mapuljat a qemavaqavai, a cemuljuculju. na venauwa uta a tacekecekeljan. nu izua mangetjez a i tjanuitjen, ta patekelan ta vinauwa, tja sikitj, tja sikitj, tja qavai a pase, a pase, pasedjalu. tja sikitj ta qavai a pasedjalu.

no sangasangasan a qadaw ta masalosalot, kaiomaq itjen a taqinaljan a mapoljat a qemavaqavai, a cemoljocoljo. na venaowa ota a tacekecekeljan. no izoa mangetjez a i tjanoitjen, ta patekelan ta vinaowa, tja sikitj, tja sikitj, tja qavai a pase, a pase, pasedjalo. tja sikitj ta qavai a pasedjalo.

nu sika, sikamusalj a, nu sikamusalj a qadaw, pumaljialjiya, pumaljimalji a kisukup, pumaljimalji a kusukup ta cemas, patjevuta tua kakavayan, nu kemesa inika maqati sedjeji a kavaquan, tja pataudan ta sicuayan a kinivaqu. nu, nu, nu ika tjen a, nu ika tjen a pasusu pinaka palisian nua ramaljemaljeng. izua tulu na ramaljemaljeng nu penu, penalu, pena, penaula, penuala itjen tua tja lami a vaqu.

no sika, sikamosalj a, no sikamosalj a qadaw, pomaljialjiya, pomaljimalji a kisokop, pomaljimalji a kosokop ta cemas, patjevota toa kakavayan, no kemesa inika maqati sedjeji a kavaqoan, tja pataodan ta sicoayan a kinivaqo. no, no, no ika tjen a, no ika tjen a pasoso pinaka palisian noa ramaljemaljeng. izoa tolo na ramaljemaljeng no peno, penalo, pena, penaola, penoala itjen toa tja lami a vaqo.

aicu a kemasi ta tjemugut a patje kivaqu, tja kinedrengan tja kinaluljayan aravac. aicu a tja lami a vaqu, tja sinan pazangal a kemasi cua kemasicuay. tazua qadaw patje patjavang a pipaljing tua kavaquan, vutjulj, qavai, a vauwa. mangetjez a malada a kemapalisi a seman nanguaq tua tja cavilj.

aico a kemasi ta tjemogot a patje kivaqo, tja kinedrengan tja kinaloljayan aravac. aico a tja lami a vaqo, tja sinan pazangal a kemasi coa kemasicoay. tazoa qadaw patje patjavang a pipaljing toa kavaqoan, votjolj, qavai, a vaowa. mangetjez a malada a kemapalisi a seman nangoaq toa tja cavilj.

nu djemaljun ta kaljasalutan a qadaw, papuljiva a uqaljaqaljai tua mareka sudju. qemu, qemuyulj tauta uri mezua si pecungu a kasiu, qemuyulj ta uri mezua si pecungu a kasiu, sa satjezi a pasa tua na sudju a umaq. aicu a namaya tucu sini pake, sini pakacadja a pakeljang tua tjenglayan. azua matjaljaljak na cemavu tu sipavalet tua uqaljay. na cemavu tu sipavalet tua sauqaljay. aza sikai izuan nasa papuljiva nu kaljasalutan, azua sikai izua nua, azua sikai izuan nasa papuljiva nu kaljasalutan. mavan azua sinipavayi tua sudjusudju a vavayavayan.

no djemaljon ta kaljasalotan a qadaw, papoljiva a oqaljaqaljai toa mareka sodjo. qemo, qemoyolj taota ori mezoa si pecongo a kasio, qemoyolj ta ori mezoa si pecongo a kasio, sa satjezi a pasa toa na sodjo a omaq. aico a namaya toco sini pake, sini pakacadja a pakeljang toa tjenglayan. azoa matjaljaljak na cemavo to sipavalet toa oqaljay. na cemavo to sipavalet toa saoqaljay. aza sikai izoan nasa papoljiva no kaljasalotan, azoa sikai izoa noa, azoa sikai izoan nasa papoljiva no kaljasalotan. mavan azoa sinipavayi toa sodjosodjo a vavayavayan.

nu sika masantjelulj a qadau, ljaki vavuluvulungan ljaki kakedriyan. ljaki kakedriyan. savid a na kipaqulid a mitung a kilalang tua kinacalisilisian. maqepuqepu itua mazazangiljan a kasasavan, parutavatavak a masasenay a maqacuvucuvung. tazua nu, tazua nu zemiyang kaki, tazua nu zemiyaziyang i katuruwan, izua mamazangiljan, izua kalailaingan, izua kalaingan a pa, papapilipiliq tua tjalja valeljeveljan a vavayan.

no sika masantjelolj a qadao, ljaki vavolovolongan ljaki kakedriyan. ljaki kakedriyan. savid a na kipaqolid a mitong a kilalang toa kinacalisilisian. maqepoqepo itoa mazazangiljan a kasasavan, parotavatavak a masasenay a maqacovocovong. tazoa no, tazoa no zemiyang kaki, tazoa no zemiyaziyang i katorowan, izoa mamazangiljan, izoa kalailaingan, izoa kalaingan a pa, papapilipiliq toa tjalja valeljeveljan a vavayan.

kitekelan a pakatua laljang. kitekelan a pakata ljaljang. aicu a namaitucu a kakudan nu masalusalut paseketj aya, na temalidu aravac. nu sikamasan simatjelj a qadau, malada a penaljingan a kemapalisi uta, kiqaung, kisukup tua cemas a papu, papuluqem.

kitekelan a pakatoa laljang. kitekelan a pakata ljaljang. aico a namaitoco a kakodan no masalosalot paseketj aya, na temalido aravac. no sikamasan simatjelj a qadao, malada a penaljingan a kemapalisi ota, kiqaong, kisokop toa cemas a papo, papoloqem.

kisu, kiqaung a kisukup tua cemas a papuluqem, tu na sevalit, tu na suljivat itjen a ta qinaljan. nu sikalimalj anga qadau, vilivi, viljeviljan a, vilivililjan anga a mavesuang, vilivililjan anga a mavesuang aya, tazua maqati anga a qemaljup, a maqati anga qemuma. patagilj anga uta a vaquan a cavilj.

kiso, kiqaong a kisokop toa cemas a papoloqem, to na sevalit, to na soljivat itjen a ta qinaljan. no sikalimalj anga qadao, vilivi, viljeviljan a, vilivililjan anga a mavesoang, vilivililjan anga a mavesoang aya, tazoa maqati anga a qemaljop, a maqati anga qemoma. patagilj anga ota a vaqoan a cavilj.
